description:
The true identity of the invader who`s been working behind the scenes all along is revealed. Was Bananya`s entire journey part of someone else`s plan?! The invader`s grand scheme sets in motion the greatest crisis the planet has ever faced! Bananya Man rushes to save Bananya. What does the future hold for them?!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: しんりゃくしゃがやってきてた, にゃ!
